title: Handle User Input Change
description: In this lab, we will learn how to detect changes in user input type using JavaScript. Specifically, we will use event listeners to detect whether the user is using a mouse or touch input, and run a callback function accordingly. This is a useful technique for providing different user experiences based on the type of input being used.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
